scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.receiver.json && tsc --project tsconfig.sender.json && cp src/index.html src/styles.css src/sender.html dist/ && cp node_modules/matter-js/build/matter.min.js dist/
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ext ts,html,css --exec npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add dist/ src/ && git commit -m 'Deploy updates' && git push origin main
scripts.android:deploy: npm run android:build && npm run android:install
